title: As a fresher freelance content writer, how much should I charge for a 500 word article? - Quora

response.answer_text: In fact I would say to not charge for the article or charge very low. As a newbie you are one of the many who are vying for the same things. Instead take feedback. Good ones. Build your portfolio. Get recommendations and keep improving. You will know when to start charging a good price which won’t be negotiated. As for the data, go to any freelancing website and see the quotes. You will get the idea. Thanks for A2A Harshit Shrivastava.

When you find a potential client, then you must not let them go. To start as a fresher you cannot expect great pay. Especially the market is so volatile and exploits writers for low pay. That does not mean you need to compromise. There are two ways to it, Accept the pay client is offering you and write to gain experience. Here you will take time to understand the businessConsult experts and do some homework before jumping into work. Here you can set a price for your work and start going.In a nutshell, I would suggest you to start and learn OR learn and start Based on the path you choose you can charge.
